fatalities.name: Suha Hamed 'Abd al-Karim Nijem al-Masri
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with her daughter and a relative who had found shelter in their home in a strike on the neighboring home of the Nijem family, in which five other members of the family and two operatives in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad were killed.

fatalities.name: Asmaa Isma'il Muhammad Jum'ah al-Ghul
fatalities.notes: Killed with her parents, sister, two brothers and three nephews as they slept in their home in the Bshit neighborhood. Eight other members of the family were injured.

fatalities.name: Hanadi Isma'il Muhammad Jum'ah al-Ghul
fatalities.notes: Killed with her parents, sister, two brothers and three nephews as they slept in their home in the Bshit neighborhood. Eight other members of the family were injured.

fatalities.name: Khadrah Khaled Ibrahim al-Ghul
fatalities.notes: Killed with her husband, four children and three grandchildren as they slept in their home in the Bshit neighborhood. Eight other members of the family were injured.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Muhammad Mahmoud Abu 'Amrah
fatalities.notes: Injured in her home when the home of the al-Khattab family was bombed. The strike also killed seven members of the al-Khattab family and Two other neighbors.

fatalities.name: Safaa 'Atwah Suliman Khatab
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with her parents, sister, two brothers and her sister-in-law. Three neighbors were also killed in the bombing.

fatalities.name: Nivin Suliman Salamah Khatab
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with her husband, father-in-law, mother-in-law, brother-in-law and her two sisters-in-law. Three neighbors were also killed in the bombing.

fatalities.name: Amirah Ahmad 'Ali Khatab
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with her husband, four children and daughter-in-law. Three neighbors were also killed in the bombing.

fatalities.name: Ghaliah al-'Abed Ahmad Abu Raidah
fatalities.notes: Shot in the head. Her body was found lying in her the yard of her home.

fatalities.name: Ilham Muhammad Mahmoud 'Okal
fatalities.notes: Killed in her backyard.

fatalities.name: Turkiyyah Mahmoud 'Alian 'Okal
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her granddaughter and nephew when they fled from their home after her daughter-in-law was killed in a strike on the yard of the home.

fatalities.name: Jamileh Jamal Mahmoud Wahdan
fatalities.notes: Killed with her three-year-old daughter and two other relatives at the home of the al-Qumsan family, where they had taken refuge.

fatalities.name: Seniora Diab 'Abd al-Karim Wahdan
fatalities.notes: Killed with three relatives at the home of the al-Qumsan family, where they had taken refuge.

fatalities.name: Arwa Mahmoud Ahmud a-Nayrab
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with three of her daughters. Four neighbors were also killed in the strike.

fatalities.name: Sa'diyah Rizeq 'Abd a-Razeq Abu Taha
fatalities.notes: Killed with her infant grandson and two of her nephews in a home in which her family had taken shelter.

fatalities.name: Hakmeh 'Awwad 'Odeh al-'Arjani
fatalities.notes: Killed together with three other members of her family in the yard of her home.

fatalities.name: Ghadir Muhammad Suliman al-'Arjani
fatalities.notes: Killed together with three other members of her family in the yard of her home.

fatalities.name: Sa'diyah Rizeq 'Abd a-Razeq Abu Taha
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with three other members of her family. The house was bombarded after a missile was fired from the area.

fatalities.name: Nihaya Sa'di 'Issa 'Abd al-Wahab
fatalities.notes: Killed with her uncle, three brothers and four children in her uncle's home in the al-Jinenah neighborhood to which her family had fled, in a strike on three of the family’s homes.

fatalities.name: Fidaa Yusef Muhammad Abu Suliman
fatalities.notes: Killed at home. In nearby houses, her sister-in-law with her four children, a niece and two women neighbors were killed.

fatalities.name: Maryam Hassan 'Ali Abu Jazar
fatalities.notes: Killed in her daughter’s home. It abuts the home of the Abu Suleiman family which was bombed. The bombing killed seven members of that Abu Suleiman family as well as a neighbor woman in a nearby home.

fatalities.name: 'Abir Sa'id Sha'ban Abu 'Arab
fatalities.notes: Killed in the bombing of the nearby home of the Abu Suleiman family. The bombing killed seven members of that Abu Suleiman family as well as a neighbor woman in a nearby home.

fatalities.name: Hibah Hassan 'Abd a-Rahman Abu Suliman
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with her four children. In nearby houses, her sister-in-law, her husband’s niece and two women neighbors were killed.

fatalities.name: Najiyah Yusef 'Alian al-Masri
fatalities.notes: Killed together with six other members of her family while they were sitting in the yard of their home.

fatalities.name: Fayzeh Jermi 'Atiyyah a-Tarabin
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her husband and their son and daughter when they tried to flee from their home.

fatalities.name: Maryam Hussein Salamah a-Tarabin
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her parents and brother when they tried to flee from their home.

fatalities.name: Yusra Muhammad Salman Jazar
fatalities.notes: Killed with her husband when they returned to their home during the humanitarian truce.

fatalities.name: Amneh Saber Muhammad a-Zamli
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her husband when they tried to return to the school where they had found refuge, after visiting their home due to the declaration of the ceasefire.

fatalities.name: Hanan 'Abd a-Latif Dakhlallah Gheith
fatalities.notes: Killed with her husband, son and granddaughter in the living room of their home.

fatalities.name: Su'ad Jum'ah Hammad a-Tarabin
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 12 relatives in whose home she took shelter, and a baby in his mother's arms, in the street, after fleeing their home on al-Balbisi St.

fatalities.name: 'Aziza Mahmoud Salamah al-Mahmum
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 11 other members of her family, a family member who took shelter in their home and a in his mother's arms, in the street, after fleeing their home on al-Balbisi St.

fatalities.name: Wafa Salem Suliman al-Mahmum
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 11 other members of her family, a family member who took shelter in their home and a baby in his mother's arms, in the street, after fleeing their home on al-Balbisi St.

fatalities.name: Iqzayah Hammad Salman al-Mahmum
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 11 other members of her family, a family member who took shelter in their home and a baby in his mother's arms, in the street, after fleeing their home on al-Balbisi St.

fatalities.name: 'Itaf Hammad Salman al-Mahmum
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 11 other members of her family, a family member who took shelter in their home and a baby in his mother's arms, in the street, after fleeing their home on al-Balbisi St.

fatalities.name: Ibtesam Hammad Salman al-Mahmum
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 11 other members of her family, a family member who took shelter in their home and a baby in his mother's arms, in the street, after fleeing their home on al-Balbisi St.

fatalities.name: Fidiyyah Hmeidan Hammad Abu 'Emran
fatalities.notes: Killed in the home of relatives together with five members of her family. Two other relatives were wounded.

fatalities.name: Radyah Zayed Suliman Abu 'Emran
fatalities.notes: Killed in the home of relatives together with five members of her family. Two other relatives were wounded.

fatalities.name: Walaa Jamal Muhammad a-Namlah
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her husband and his sister on the street after fleeing their home in east Rafah, hoping to find shelter in downtown Rafah.

fatalities.name: 'Awatef 'Aziz a-Din 'Abd a-Shafi al-Farra
fatalities.notes: Killed together with eight members of her family after they left their house in an attempt to flee the spot during a bombing.

fatalities.name: Du'aa Ibrahim Mahmoud Sheikh al-'Eid
fatalities.notes: Killed together with six family members while standing together with other members near the al-Bar wa-Takwa Mosque, after they had fled from their home. A passerby was killed a few minutes earlier, and three paramedics were killed when another missile was fired at them as they attempted to rescue the members of the family.

fatalities.name: Soheila Ahmad Mahmoud a-Nayrab
fatalities.notes: Killed with her husband and three children in their apartment in the a-Sabra neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Iman Nazmi Muhammad Madi
fatalities.notes: Killed together with five other members of her family in her home. Six other members of the family were injured.

fatalities.name: Raedah 'Abd Rabo Musa Abu Khatlah
fatalities.notes: Killed on Salah a-Din St.

fatalities.name: Fayzeh Harb Muhammad Abu Mor
fatalities.notes: Killed close to Abu Yusuf a-Najar Square.

fatalities.name: Safaa Hamad Sa'id Qishtah
fatalities.notes: Killed at home in her kitchen.

fatalities.name: Su'ad 'Ali Muhammad al-Bahri
fatalities.notes: Killed in the yard of her home together with her granddaughter.

fatalities.name: Nur Saleh Salamah Abu Mashi
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home. Five other members of her family were injured in the strike and a neighbor standing in the street was killed.

fatalities.name: Nuha Jamal Yusef Ghneim
fatalities.notes: Killed with her father-in-law in his home in a-Tanur neighborhood. Other members of the family were injured.

fatalities.name: Sabha Mustafa Darwish Zo'rub
fatalities.notes: Killed with 14 relatives in her daughter’s home to which she had fled. The bombing also killed a six-week-old baby boy in a neighboring home.

fatalities.name: Ahlam Nu'man Muhammad Siyam
fatalities.notes: Killed with her two children and 12 other relatives in her sister’s home to which her family had fled. The bombing also killed a six-week-old baby boy in a neighboring home.

fatalities.name: Su'ad Nu'man Muhammad Zo'rub
fatalities.notes: Killed with her four children and ten other relatives in her sister’s home to which her family had fled. The bombing also killed a six-week-old baby boy in a neighboring home.

fatalities.name: Sanaa Nu'man Muhammad Zo'rub
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with her husband, four of their children, her mother, two sisters and their six children who had taken shelter in their home. The bombing also killed a six-week-old baby boy in a neighboring home.

fatalities.name: Hanan Yusef Saleh Abu Ta'imah
fatalities.notes: Killed at home along with four other people, one of whom was a Hamas military branch operative.

fatalities.name: Maha 'Abd a-Nabi Salim Abu Hilal
fatalities.notes: Killed while she was in her home.

fatalities.name: Maryam Muhammad Muhammad Abu Jalalah
fatalities.notes: Injured in the bombing the al-Barakeh wastewater treatment facility in the a-Sheikh Zayed Sq. where many people had taken shelter. Earlier, rockets had been fired from that area.

fatalities.name: Siham Bashir Ahmad Sha'th
fatalities.notes: Killed at home. Her infant son was injured.

fatalities.name: Labibah Ibrahim Shaker Abu Shuqah
fatalities.notes: Killed together with eight other members of her family in the home of relatives where she had found shelter. Another member of the family was injured and died later of her injuries. The strike also killed a woman and two girls from the al-'Asar family.

fatalities.name: Ilham Ibrahim Shaker Abu Shuqah
fatalities.notes: Killed together with eight other members of her family in the home of relatives where she had found shelter. Another member of the family was injured and died later of her injuries. The strike also killed a woman and two girls from the al-'Asar family.

fatalities.name: 'Abir 'Amer 'Abd al-Hamid al-Bayumi
fatalities.notes: Killed together with eight other members of her family in the home of relatives where she had found shelter. Another member of the family was injured and died later of her injuries. The strike also killed a woman and two girls from the al-'Asar family.

fatalities.name: 'Abir Nahed Muhammad al-'Assar
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with her daughter and niece in a strike on the neighboring home of the al-Bayumi family, in which ten members of the extended al-Bayumi family were killed.

fatalities.name: Ni'mah Darwish Hussein Abu Shuqah
fatalities.notes: Killed together with eight other members of her family in the home of relatives where she had found shelter. Another member of the family was injured and died later of her injuries. The strike also killed a woman and two girls from the al-'Asar family.

fatalities.name: Zeinab Yusef 'Issa Zaqut
fatalities.notes: Injured in her daughter's home and died later of her injuries. Nine members of her extended family were killed, as well as a woman and two girls from the al-A'sar family in the neighboring house.

fatalities.name: Amal 'Abd al-Karim Suliman al-Masri
fatalities.notes: Killed together with three members of her family, riding in a car on their way back from visiting injured people at Shuhada al-Aqsa Hospital.

fatalities.name: Ilham Yihya Khamis a-Loh
fatalities.notes: Killed together with three members of her family, riding in a car on their way back from visiting injured people at Shuhada al-Aqsa Hospital.

fatalities.name: Meyasar Muhammad Mhareb a-T'aban
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home. Two of her children, aged seven and nine, were injured.

fatalities.name: Maryam Ahmad Muhammad Abu Hijazi
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home in the vicinity of Ma’an. Three homes were hit in the bombing, another six people were killed and about twenty injured.

fatalities.name: Subhiya Ibrahim Mustafa al-Ghalban
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home in the vicinity of Ma’an. Three homes were hit in the bombing, another six people were killed and about twenty injured.

fatalities.name: Zeinab Mahmoud Ahmad Abu Jazar
fatalities.notes: Killed in the home of relatives in the vicinity of Ma’an. Three homes were hit in the bombing, another six people were killed and about twenty injured.

fatalities.name: Aya Muhammad Yusef al-Khalili
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her husband, her daughter, her brother-in-law and sister-in-law, and their three children in her father-in-law's home while they were waiting for a taxi to evacuate them from the area due to intensifying strikes. The other members of the family had already left shortly before.

fatalities.name: Nidaa Ziad Ahmad al-Khalili
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her husband, her three children, her brother-in-law and sister-in-law, and their daughter in her father-in-law's home while they were waiting for a taxi to evacuate them from the area due to intensifying strikes. The other members of the family had already left shortly before.

fatalities.name: Mahdiyah Suliman Naser a-Raqab
fatalities.notes: Killed in a strike on land adjacent to her home.

fatalities.name: Iftikhar Muhammad 'Abd al-'Aziz a-Zari'i
fatalities.notes: Injured while sitting in the shade of a tree in the yard in her home. Died shortly afterwards of her injuries.

fatalities.name: Wadi'ah Muhammad Kheir Sa'id a-Zein
fatalities.notes: Killed at home when her neighborhood was shelled.

fatalities.name: 'Ayidah 'Iz a-Din 'Omar 'Abd a-Ghafur
fatalities.notes: Killed with her mother and daughter, in the mother's house in the neighborhood of Dahret a-Sheikh Muhammad.

fatalities.name: Siham Raji Khalil a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her daughter and granddaughter in her home in the neighborhood of Dhahrat a-Sheikh Muhammad.

fatalities.name: Hanaa 'Ali Jaber Al-Hashash
fatalities.notes: A disabled woman, killed together with her three children and her husband's two sons from another wife, three of whom were operatives in the armed wing of Hamas. The neighbor, Muhammad al-Hashash was killed trying to rescue her.

fatalities.name: Falastin Muhammad Sa'id Abu Zeid
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with six other members of her family. Two other members of the family were injured and died later of their injuries.

fatalities.name: Sabrin Khader Sa'id Abu Zeid
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with six other members of her family. Two other members of the family were injured and died later of their injuries.

fatalities.name: Maryam Marzuq 'Abd al-Karim Abu Zeid
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with six other members of her family. Two other members of the family were injured and died later of their injuries.

fatalities.name: Widad Ahmad Salamah Abu Zeid
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with six other members of her family. Two other members of the family were injured and died later of their injuries.

fatalities.name: 'Aishah Salamah 'Abd al-Karim Abu 'Eid
fatalities.notes: Killed in her apartment on the second story of the a-Safa tower. Three other members of her family were injured.

fatalities.name: Sabrin Muhammad 'Atiyyah Abu Khusah
fatalities.notes: Killed together with six other members of her family, including her two children, in a strike on her parents' home, which collapsed on the people who were inside. Her husband was injured in the strike and died later.

fatalities.name: Sabah Mubarak Bheiri Abu Khusah
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with six other members of her family, when the house collapsed on the people who were inside. Another member of the family was injured in the strike and died later.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Muhammad Nimer Abu 'Arar
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home when two operatives in an armed wing passed by her. Her sister lost both her legs in the strike and their home was partially destroyed.

fatalities.name: 'Aliyyah Hussein Muhammad Qanan
fatalities.notes: Injured while searching for his brother how had been injured earlier. Died of his wounds on 10 October 2014.

fatalities.name: Soheila 'Abd al-Qader Muhammad al-Ja'el
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with her two granddaughters.

fatalities.name: Khulud Muhammad Isma'il Hamu
fatalities.notes: Killed in her apartment in a building in the town of a-Zahraa.

fatalities.name: Dima 'Abd al-Majid Muhammad Kallub
fatalities.notes: Injured in her home in a strike in which her four-year-old son was killed.

fatalities.name: 'Aishah Hamdan Muhammad a-Sa'ud
fatalities.notes: Killed in her parents' home together with 16 other members of her family and two other people in a strike on three homes of her extended family. The houses collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Anwaar Muhammad Salem Abu Jaber
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 16 other members of her family and two other people in a strike on three homes of her extended family. The houses collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Lina Kifah Mahmoud Abu Jaber
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 16 other members of her family and two other people in a strike on three homes of her extended family. The houses collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Sumayah 'Abd a-Rahman Muhammad Abu Jaber
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 16 other members of her family and two other people in a strike on three homes of her extended family. The houses collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Dina Hamdan Muhammad Abu Jaber
fatalities.notes: Killed in her parents' home together with 16 other members of her family and two other people in a strike on three homes of her extended family. The houses collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Faddah Ghanam Hassan Abu Jaber
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 16 other members of her family and two other people in a strike on three homes of her extended family. The houses collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Sahar Mutawe' Muhammad Balatah
fatalities.notes: Killed in her brother-in-law's home together with her husband, her seven children, and two other members of her family. Her one-year-old grandson was injured and died of his injuries several days later.

fatalities.name: Maryam Na'im Nazmi Balatah
fatalities.notes: Killed in her uncle's home together with her parents, her five siblings, and two other members of her family. Her one-year-old nephew was injured and died of his injuries several days later.

fatalities.name: Du'aa Na'im Nazmi Balatah
fatalities.notes: Killed in her uncle's home together with her parents, her five siblings, and two other members of her family. Her one-year-old nephew was injured and died of his injuries several days later.

fatalities.name: Hanaa Na'im Nazmi Balatah
fatalities.notes: Killed in her uncle's home together with her parents, her five siblings, and two other members of her family. Her one-year-old nephew was injured and died of his injuries several days later.

fatalities.name: Wafa Na'im Nazmi Balatah
fatalities.notes: Killed in her uncle's home together with her parents, her five siblings, and two other members of her family. Her one-year-old nephew was injured and died of his injuries several days later.

fatalities.name: Aya Jamil Ahmad a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 32 other people, including four of her brothers, her father, and her niece, in their apartment on the third story of a populated apartment block hit by a strike. The building collapsed on the people inside, all of whom were killed, including a family that had found shelter in an abandoned kindergarten on the first story. A girl in a neighboring house was also killed in the attack.

fatalities.name: Muna Hajjaj Ibrahim Abu 'Amer
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 32 other people, including her husband and her five children, in a strike on an inhabited apartment block in which the family had found refuge in an abandoned kindergarten. The building collapsed on the people inside, all of whom were killed. A girl in a neighboring house was also killed in the attack.

fatalities.name: Basemah Salem Salim Breikah
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 32 other people, including her husband, two of her daughters, her sister-in-law, and her mother-in-law, in a strike on an inhabited apartment block in which the family had found refuge in an abandoned kindergarten. The building collapsed on the people inside, all of whom were killed. A girl in a neighboring house was also killed in the attack.

fatalities.name: Subhiya Muanis Mahmoud Breikah
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 32 other people, including two of her sons, her mother-in-law, and two of her granddaughters, in their apartment on the second story of a populated apartment block hit by a strike. The building collapsed on the people inside, all of whom were killed, including a family that had found shelter in an abandoned kindergarten on the first story. A girl in a neighboring house was also killed in the attack.

fatalities.name: Walaa Jamil Ahmad a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 32 other people, including four of her brothers, her father, and her niece, in their apartment on the third story of a populated apartment block hit by a strike. The building collapsed on the people inside, all of whom were killed, including a family that had found shelter in an abandoned kindergarten on the first story. A girl in a neighboring house was also killed in the attack.

fatalities.name: 'Orubah Suliman Ahmad Abu 'Amer
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 32 other people, including her husband, her five children, and two of her brother-in-laws, in a strike on an inhabited apartment block in which the family had found refuge in an abandoned kindergarten. The building collapsed on the people inside, all of whom were killed. A girl in a neighboring house was also killed in the attack.

fatalities.name: Hend Marzuq Nadi M'amer
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 32 other people, including her brother and two of her nephews, in their apartment on the second story of a populated apartment block hit by a strike. The building collapsed on the people inside, all of whom were killed, including a family that had found shelter in an abandoned kindergarten on the first story. A girl in a neighboring house was also killed in the attack.

fatalities.name: Wafa 'Abd a-Razeq 'Eid Dheir
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Turkiyyah Khalil Hamed Dheir
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: 'Ula Mahmoud Salamah Dheir
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Jamalat Mahmoud Muhammad Dheir
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Rim 'Abd al-'Aziz Muhammad Dheir
fatalities.notes: Killed in his home together with 18 other members of his family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Yasmin Ahmad Hammad Dheir
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Shuruq Mahmoud Salamah Dheir
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Nihad Khalil Sa'id Suliman
fatalities.notes: Killed with five members of her family at her brother’s home, where her family had found shelter, in a strike on the nearby al-‘Omari Mosque. Eighteen people were killed in the strike, including a civil defense worker who was a Hamas military branch operative, and three people who were injured and later died of their injuries.

fatalities.name: Kaenat 'Adel Ahmad Hamuda
fatalities.notes: Killed with five members of her family at the home of her brother-in-law, where her family had found shelter, in a strike on the nearby al-‘Omari Mosque. Eighteen people were killed in the strike, including a civil defense worker who was a Hamas military branch operative, and three people who were injured and later died of their injuries.

fatalities.name: Majedah Jamal Hassan Hamuda
fatalities.notes: Killed with five members of her family at the home of her brother-in-law, where her family had found shelter, in a strike on the nearby al-‘Omari Mosque. Eighteen people were killed in the strike, including a civil defense worker who was a Hamas military branch operative, and three people who were injured and later died of their injuries.

fatalities.name: Barakah Ibrahim Hassan 'Abd Rabo
fatalities.notes: Killed with seven members of her family at the home of relatives where her family had found shelter, in a strike on the nearby al-‘Omari Mosque. Eighteen people were killed in the strike, including a civil defense worker who was a Hamas military branch operative, and three people who were injured and later died of their injuries.

fatalities.name: Halimah Mahmoud Muhammad al-Batsh
fatalities.notes: Killed on the street, in the strike on al-‘Omari Mosque. Eighteen people were killed in the strike, including a civil defense worker who was a Hamas military branch operative, and three people who were injured and later died of their injuries.

fatalities.name: Maysaa 'Abd a-Sami' Musa a-Najar

fatalities.name: Ibtesam 'Abd a-Sami' Harb a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with 15 members of her family, including four Hamas military branch operatives, in an air strike on the homes of the extended a-Najar family. The strike destroyed two of the family's homes, in each of which eight people were killed. Other houses were damaged.

fatalities.name: Fawzeyeh Qassem Hanun a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with 15 members of her family, including four Hamas military branch operatives, in an air strike on the homes of the extended a-Najar family. The strike destroyed two of the family's homes, in each of which eight people were killed. Other houses were damaged.

fatalities.name: Aya Ibrahim Hassan Abu Sitah
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with 15 members of her family, including four Hamas military branch operatives, in an air strike on the homes of the extended a-Najar family. The strike destroyed two of the family's homes, in each of which eight people were killed. Other houses were damaged.

fatalities.name: Muna Isma'il Khamis a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with 15 members of her family, including four Hamas military branch operatives, in an air strike on the homes of the extended a-Najar family. The strike destroyed two of the family's homes, in each of which eight people were killed. Other houses were damaged.

fatalities.name: Fayzeh Ahmad 'Abd al-Fatah a-Nadi
fatalities.notes: Killed at the entrance to her home in the al-Juron neighborhood, as she was about to flee. Another man was also killed at the entrance to his home.

fatalities.name: Jihan Salem Muhammad al-Far
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with eight other members of her family when the home collapsed on the people who were inside. Two of those killed were relatives from Jordan who had come to the Gaza Strip for a wedding and were unable to return following the closure of Rafah Crossing.

fatalities.name: Nivin Salem Muhammad al-Far
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with eight other members of her family when the home collapsed on the people who were inside. Two of those killed were relatives from Jordan who had come to the Gaza Strip for a wedding and were unable to return following the closure of Rafah Crossing.

fatalities.name: Amal Salem Muhammad al-Far
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with eight other members of her family when the home collapsed on the people who were inside. Two of those killed were relatives from Jordan who had come to the Gaza Strip for a wedding and were unable to return following the closure of Rafah Crossing.

fatalities.name: Zinat Hassan Ahmad al-Far
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with eight other members of her family when the home collapsed on the people who were inside. Two of those killed were relatives from Jordan who had come to the Gaza Strip for a wedding and were unable to return following the closure of Rafah Crossing.

fatalities.name: Riham Hussein Ahmad al-Far
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with eight other members of her family when the home collapsed on the people who were inside. Two of those killed were relatives from Jordan who had come to the Gaza Strip for a wedding and were unable to return following the closure of Rafah Crossing.

fatalities.name: Maryam Ahmad Khalil 'Abd Rabo

fatalities.name: Marwah Jamil Shaker al-Agha

fatalities.name: Jalilah Faraj 'Ayad
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home in the west end of Gaza City.

fatalities.name: Ne'meh Muhammad Hassan Abu 'Amshah
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her husband in a strike on their neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Ghaliah Muhammad Ahmad a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Kifah Samir Hussein a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Riham Faiz Muhammad a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Ikhlas Samir Hussein Abu Shahlah
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Sumayah Harb Yusef a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 18 other members of her family in her relatives' home, which collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Iman Salah Mahmoud a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with 18 other members of her family when the house collapsed on the people who were inside.

fatalities.name: Sumoud Hatem Zaki Wahdan

fatalities.name: Zeinab Hatem Zaki Wahdan

fatalities.name: Baghdad Ahmad Hussein Wahdan
fatalities.notes: Killed when her husband’s parents’ home was bombed, along with them, her two sons who were minors, her two daughters, and the toddler daughter of one of them.

fatalities.name: Su'ad Isma'il Muhammad Wahdan

fatalities.name: Salmah Salman Muhammad Radwan

fatalities.name: Hiyam 'Abd al-Karim Ahmad Abu Mur
fatalities.notes: Killed close to her home.

fatalities.name: Yusra Salem Hassan al-Barim
fatalities.notes: Killed in the yard of her home.

fatalities.name: Maram Rajeh 'Abd a-Rahman Rajeh
fatalities.notes: Killed in the yard at her grandmother's home.

fatalities.name: Shaimaa Hussein 'Abd al-Qader a-Sheikh 'Ali
fatalities.notes: Nine months pregnant, killed in her home. Doctors delivered the baby, who died several days later. Five additional family members were injured.

fatalities.name: Najat Ibrahim Hamdan a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed in the home of relatives in the a-Ghazazwa neighborhood. Five members of her family were injured.

fatalities.name: Khadrah Ibrahim Salman Abu Balimah

fatalities.name: Ghadir Ibrahim Suliman Abu Rjeileh

fatalities.name: Malak Amin Ahmad al-Astal

fatalities.name: Dawlat Nafez Salman Qdeih
fatalities.notes: Injured together with four other people while they were trying to flee from the area in a three-wheeled vehicle.

fatalities.name: Nahed Helmi Muhammad Abu Rjeileh
fatalities.notes: Killed along with her father and brother in their home.

fatalities.name: Sanaa Hassan 'Ali al-Astal
fatalities.notes: Killed with two of her sons, one of them an operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad, in their home.

fatalities.name: Jamileh Salim 'Eid Abu 'Aytah
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her husband, two of her sons, and her grandson in a strike on the neighboring house, which was empty.

fatalities.name: Tamam Muhammad 'Abd a-Rahman Hamad
fatalities.notes: Killed on the roof of her home.

fatalities.name: 'Ula Khalil 'Ali Abu 'Abdah
fatalities.notes: Killed in the bombing of a home she had rented with her husband. Their three daughters were injured.

fatalities.name: Zeinab Ahmad Ibrahim Abu Teir
fatalities.notes: Killed in the inner courtyard of her home in the bombardment of the home of Ibrahim Abu Tir, in which another person was also killed.

fatalities.name: Falastin Hussein Hassan a-Shanbari
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 11 other people during the shelling of an UNRWA school in Beit Hanun where she had found shelter.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Muhammad Ayub a-Shanbari
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 11 other people during the shelling of an UNRWA school in Beit Hanun where she had found shelter.

fatalities.name: Ikram Ahmad Tawfiq a-Shambari
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 11 other people during the shelling of an UNRWA school in Beit Hanun where her family had found shelter.

fatalities.name: Nur Safwat 'Abed Abu Teir
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her sister in their family's home in a strike on the neighboring house.

fatalities.name: Fathiya Nadi Marzuq Abu Mu'ammar
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home. One of her relatives was injured in the incident.

fatalities.name: 'Itaf Kamel Muhammad Abu Daqah
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home.

fatalities.name: Manal Muhammad Mahmoud al-Astal

fatalities.name: Nariman Khalil Suliman al-Bshiti
fatalities.notes: Injured at home with other members of her family in the region of al-Fukhari. Her seven-year-old son was killed on site, and her infant son later succumbed to her injuries.

fatalities.name: Yasmin Hassan Muhammad al-Maqat'ah
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home in a strike on the homes of her extended family. Another member of her family was killed in one of the other homes.

fatalities.name: Iman Mahmoud 'Abdallah Qdeih
fatalities.notes: Injured in when a-Ridwan neighborhood was shelled.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Hassan 'Awwad 'Azzam
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her sister in their home.

fatalities.name: Maryam Hassan 'Awwad 'Azzam
fatalities.notes: Killed with her sister in her home.

fatalities.name: Yasmin Ahmad 'Odeh Abu Mur
fatalities.notes: Injured in a strike on farmland close to her home. Another woman was killed in the strike.

fatalities.name: Khadrah 'Awwad Salam Abu Teilakh
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home in a strike on adjacent farmland. Another woman was injured in the strike and died some two days later of her injuries.

fatalities.name: Rasmiya Muhammad Yusef Salamah
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her son while they were in their home together with other members of their family.

fatalities.name: Suha Na'im Muhammad Ekhrawat
fatalities.notes: Was at an advanced stage of pregnancy. Killed with her one-year-old daughter. The baby was born by Caesarian section in hospital and died two hours later. Three other members of her family were injured in the incident.

fatalities.name: Hakmeh Nafe'a Silmi Abu 'Adwan
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her sister close to their home.

fatalities.name: Najah Nafe'a Silmi Abu 'Adwan
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her sister on the street close to their home.

fatalities.name: Salwa 'Abd al-'Aziz Ahmad al-Munifi
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her daughter when they fled from their home with their families. Her husband and son tried to find shelter in an agricultural shed and were injured by an additional missile fired at them.

fatalities.name: Samira Sanad Muhammad al-Munifi
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her mother when they fled from their home with their families. Her father and brother tried to find shelter in an agricultural shed and were injured by an additional missile fired at them.

fatalities.name: Shamah 'Imad 'Alian Abu Raidah
fatalities.notes: Injured in her home. Her husband was killed and her two children injured.

fatalities.name: Layla A'bbas Isma'il al-Wahidi

fatalities.name: 'Azzah 'Abd al-Karim 'Abd a-Rahman al-Falit

fatalities.name: Surah Sha'ban Muhammad Dirbas

Sha'ban a-Dahduh, an operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad, who was in the building was also killed, and according to a military statement was the target of the strike.

fatalities.name: Inas Sha'ban Muhammad Dirbas

Sha'ban a-Dahduh, an operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad, who was in the building was also killed, and according to a military statement was the target of the strike.

fatalities.name: Taghrid Sha'ban Muhammad al-Kilani

Sha'ban a-Dahduh, an operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad, who was in the building was also killed, and according to a military statement was the target of the strike.

fatalities.name: 'Ayidah Sha'ban Muhammad Dirbas
fatalities.notes: Killed together with 10 members of the Kilani and Dirbas families in a strike on the a-Salaam office building in which they had found shelter. Sha'ban a-Dahduh, an operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad, who was in the building was also killed, and according to a military statement was the target of the strike.

fatalities.name: Fatimah 'Abd a-Rahim 'Abd al-Qader Abu Amuna

fatalities.name: Saedah Hassan Hamad Siyam

fatalities.name: Shirin Muhammad Salam Siyam

fatalities.name: Sumoud Naser Mustafa Siyam
fatalities.notes: Killed in a strike together with 10 other members of her family who left their home after it was damaged. Two family members were injured in the incident and died later of their wounds.

fatalities.name: Safinaz Nabih 'Issa al-Yazji

fatalities.name: Rasha 'Abd Rabo Muhammad 'Afanah

fatalities.name: Saedah Thabet Sa'id a-Nakhaleh

fatalities.name: 'Aliaa Khader Yusef Siyam

fatalities.name: Fayzeh Saber Ahmad Siyam
fatalities.notes: Killed together with eight other members of her family in a strike on the top floor of the home of the al-Qasas family.

fatalities.name: Sumayah Muhammad Nassar al-Qassas
fatalities.notes: Killed together with eight other members of her family in a strike on the top floor of the home of the al-Qasas family.

fatalities.name: Iman Muhammad Ibrahim Hamadah

fatalities.name: Hamdiyah Ahmad Hamdan Shmali
fatalities.notes: Killed at home along with her husband and two sons, both of whom were Hamas military branch operatives.

fatalities.name: 'Aishah 'Ali Mahmoud Zayed

fatalities.name: Hanan Ramadan Mustafa Daher

fatalities.name: Muftiyah Muhammad Hussein Ziyadah

fatalities.name: Bayan 'Abd a-Latif Isma'il Ziyadah
fatalities.notes: Killed along with six members of her family and another person when their house collapsed on them.

fatalities.name: Samar Ousamah Khalil al-Halaq
fatalities.notes: Killed together with six members of her family in an apartment on the second story of a residential building in the a-Rimal neighborhood. fatalities.name: Halah Akram Hassan al-Halaq
fatalities.notes: Killed together with six members of her family in an apartment on the second story of a residential building in the a-Rimal neighborhood. Three brothers from the 'Amer family and their cousin, who were in their apartment on the first story of the building, were also killed in the attack.

fatalities.name: Su'ad Muhammad 'Abd a-Razeq al-Halaq

Three brothers from the 'Amer family and their cousin, who were in their apartment on the first story of the building, were also killed in the attack.

fatalities.name: Najah Sa'ed a-Din Mahmoud Daraji

fatalities.name: Aya Bahajat Hassan Abu Sultan

fatalities.name: Maysah 'Abd a-Rahman Sa'id a-Sarsawi

fatalities.name: Khadijeh 'Ali Musa Shihadah

fatalities.name: Mahdiyeah Sa'id Hussein al-Mbayed

fatalities.name: Layla Hassan Mahmoud a-Sha'er

fatalities.name: Sabah Tawfiq Mahmoud Abu Jame'
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with 24 other members of her family and an operative in the armed wing of Hamas after the building in which the extended family lived collapsed on the people inside.

fatalities.notes: Killed at home with 24 other members of her family and an operative in the armed wing of Hamas after the building in which the Abu Jame' extended family lived collapsed on the people inside.

fatalities.name: Yasmin Ahmad Salamah Abu Jame'
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with 24 other members of her family and an operative in the armed wing of Hamas after the building in which the Abu Jame' extended family lived collapsed on the people inside.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Riyad 'Abd a-Rahman Abu Jame'
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with 24 other members of her family and an operative in the armed wing of Hamas after the building in which the Abu Jame' extended family lived collapsed on the people inside.

fatalities.name: Muna Suliman Ahmad a-Sheikh Khalil
fatalities.notes: Killed in the stairwell of her home together with six other members of her family and another person who had found shelter in their home.

fatalities.name: 'Ayidah Muhammad 'Abed a-Sheikh Khalil
fatalities.notes: Killed in the stairwell of her home together with six other members of her family and another person who had found shelter in their home.

fatalities.name: Jawaher Suliman Hamtu a-Sheikh Khalil
fatalities.notes: Killed in the stairwell of her home together with six other members of her family and another person who had found shelter in their home.

fatalities.name: 'Adilah Suliman Ahmad a-Sheikh Khalil
fatalities.notes: Killed in the stairwell of her home together with six other members of her family and another person who had found shelter in their home.

fatalities.name: Halah Saqer Hassan al-Hayah

fatalities.name: Israa Yasser 'Atiyyah Hamdiyah

fatalities.name: In'am Muhammad Suliman al-'Ateiwi

fatalities.name: Muna 'Abd a-Rahman Mahmoud 'Ayad

fatalities.name: Nirmin Rafiq Diab 'Ayad
fatalities.notes: Killed trying to flee with her family from their home in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'yah. Thirteen other people were killed in the incident - ten from her family and three from the Islim family.

fatalities.name: Fidaa Rafiq Diab 'Ayad
fatalities.notes: Killed trying to flee with her family from their home in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'yah. Thirteen other people were killed in the incident - ten from her family and three from the Islim family.

fatalities.name: Halah Subhi Sa'di 'Ayad
fatalities.notes: Killed trying to flee with her family from their home in the neighborhood of a-Shuja'yah. Thirteen other people were killed in the incident - ten from her family and three from the Islim family.

fatalities.name: Asmaa Jihad Mahmoud al-Hilu

fatalities.name: Siham 'Ata Salim al-Hilu

fatalities.name: Tahrir Jihad Mahmoud al-Hilu

fatalities.name: Hidayah Talal Mahmoud al-Hilu
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home together with nine other members of her family after her uncle's house collapsed on top of them. Another member of the family was injured in the incident and died two days later.

fatalities.name: 'Ula Muhammad Ahmad Abu a-So'ud
fatalities.notes: Killed in her family’s home.

fatalities.name: Dalia 'Abd al-Hamid Hussein a-Zwiedi
fatalities.notes: Killed at home along with four members of her family.

fatalities.name: M'aali 'Abd a-Rahman Suliman Abu Zayed
fatalities.notes: Killed at home.

fatalities.name: Manwa 'Abd al-Basset Ahmad al-Bu'

fatalities.name: Rajaa 'Alian Khalil Abu Jarad

fatalities.name: Selmiyeh Suliman Jadu' Ghayad

fatalities.name: Turkiyyah al-'Abed Muhammad al-Biss

fatalities.name: Zeinab Sa'id Muhammad al-'Abadleh

fatalities.name: Khadrah al-'Abed Salamah Abu Daqah

fatalities.name: Kawthar Hussein Hassan al-Astal

fatalities.name: Bushra Khalil Ahmad Zo'rub

fatalities.name: Hijaziyah Hammad Sha'ban al-Hilu
fatalities.notes: Killed at home.

fatalities.name: Hanadi Hamdan Mansur Abu Mu'amar

fatalities.name: Ruwayda Ahmad Hussein Abu Harb

fatalities.name: Layla Hassan Ahmad al-'Odat

fatalities.name: Ramziyah Muhammad 'Abd al-'Aal 'Abd al-'Aal
fatalities.notes: Killed at home along with her son. Another son was injured in the incident and died of wounds a week later.

fatalities.name: Amal Hassan Muhammad 'Ali al-Batsh
fatalities.notes: Killed in the bombing of her home along with another 16 members of her family. Another member of the family who was wounded in the incident later died of his wounds.

fatalities.name: Samah 'Alaa Subhi al-Batsh
fatalities.notes: Killed in the bombing of her home along with another 16 members of her family. Another member of the family who was wounded in the incident later died of his wounds.

fatalities.name: Marwah Majed Subhi al-Batsh
fatalities.notes: Killed in the bombing of her home along with another 16 members of her family. Another member of the family who was wounded in the incident later died of his wounds.

fatalities.name: 'Aziza Yusef Ahmad al-Batsh
fatalities.notes: Killed in the bombing of his home along with another 16 members of his family. Another member of the family who was wounded in the incident later died of his wounds.

fatalities.name: 'Ula Hassan Muhammad Washahi

fatalities.name: Suha Musbah Ahmad Abu S'adah
fatalities.notes: A live-in resident of a special-needs hostel run by Mabarrah, an NGO. Killed along with another resident when the hostel was bombed. Three hostel residents were injured.

fatalities.name: Khawlah Mahmoud Sarhan al-Hawajri

fatalities.name: Kifah Shaker Diab al-Ghannam
fatalities.notes: Killed along with four members of her family when their home collapsed on them due to a strike.

fatalities.name: Ghaliah Dib Jaber al-Ghannam
fatalities.notes: Killed along with four members of her family when their home collapsed on them due to a strike.

fatalities.name: Wisam 'Abd a-Razeq Hassan al-Ghannam
fatalities.notes: Killed along with four members of her family when their home collapsed on them due to a strike.

fatalities.name: Najlaa Mahmoud Lutfi al-Haj
fatalities.notes: Killed along with seven members of her family when their house collapsed on them due to a strike.

fatalities.name: Asmaa Mahmoud Lutfi al-Haj
fatalities.notes: Killed along with seven members of his family when their house collapsed on them due to a strike.

fatalities.name: Basemah 'Abd al-Qader Muhammad al-Haj
fatalities.notes: Killed along with seven members of his family when their house collapsed on them due to a strike.

fatalities.name: Amal Yusef 'Abed 'Abd a-Ghafur

fatalities.name: Asmaa Hani Saleh Hamad

fatalities.name: Selmiyeh Hassan Muslem al-'Arja

fatalities.name: Nayfeh Muhammad Taher Frajallah

fatalities.name: 'Aishah Shabib Mahmoud a-Nawasrah

fatalities.name: Sahar Hassan 'Ali al-Masri

fatalities.name: Hanaa Muhammad Fuad Yusef Malka

fatalities.name: Dina Mahdi Muhammad Hamad
fatalities.notes: Killed at home along with five other members of her family when her uncle Hafez Hamad was assassinated.

fatalities.name: Suha Hamad Ahmad Hamad
fatalities.notes: Killed at home along with five other members of her family when Hafez Hamad was assassinated.

fatalities.name: Rasmiya Khalil Mahmoud Hamad
fatalities.notes: Killed at home along with five other members of her family when her son Hafez Hamad was assassinated.

fatalities.name: Amneh 'Atiyyah Mahmoud Qdeih
fatalities.notes: Mentally disturbed. Hit after dark by firing from military tower while she was near Gaza border fence. Her body was found by relatives the next morning.

fatalities.name: Lubna Munir Sa'id al-Hanash
fatalities.notes: Hit by shots a soldier fired near Route 60 while she was walking on the grounds of Al-‘ Arrub College, after a Molotov cocktail was thrown at an Israeli car traveling along the road ahead of the vehicle in which the soldier who fired and the second-in-command of the Yehuda Brigade were passengers.

fatalities.name: Yusra Basel Murtada a-Shawa
fatalities.notes: Killed in the bombing of her house in a-Shujayah, Gaza City, shortly after the passage of a calvacade of Arab foreign ministers and the Turkish foreign minister. Three other civilians, who were watching the calvacade, were killed on the street.

fatalities.name: Nasmah Helmi Salem Abu Zor
fatalities.notes: Killed while running from her house after it was damaged in the bombing of a nearby house belonging to an Islamic Jihad activist. Three other civilians were also killed.

fatalities.name: Sahar Fadi As'ad Abu Zor
fatalities.notes: Killed while running from her house after it was damaged in the bombing of a nearby house belonging to an Islamic Jihad activist. Three other civilians were also killed.

fatalities.name: Sabah Muhammad Harb a-Skafi
fatalities.notes: Wounded on her way from the UNRWA clinic in a-Tofah to her house in a-Shujayah in Gaza City.

fatalities.name: Sa'diyah Muhammad 'Aydi a-Dib
fatalities.notes: Killed while she was feeding the chickens she raised on farmland near her house in a-Shujayah, Gaza City.

fatalities.name: Nawal Faraj Mahmoud 'Abd al-'Aal
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home in a-Tofah in Gaza City, during the bombing of the police station nearby.

fatalities.name: Amineh Matar Hassan al-Mzannar
fatalities.notes: Killed with her grandson in the bombing of the a-Dalu family's house next door, in which nine members of the a-Dalu family were killed.

fatalities.name: Tahani Hasunah Ahmad a-Dalu
fatalities.notes: Killed with another nine members of her family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

fatalities.name: Samah 'Abd al-Hamid Ishaq a-Dalu
fatalities.notes: Killed with nine other members of her family while they were at home. In that bombing two members of the al-Maznar family in the house next door were also killed.

fatalities.name: Soheila Mahmoud Yasin a-Dalu
fatalities.notes: Killed with another nine members of her family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

fatalities.name: Ranin Jamal Mahmoud a-Dalu
fatalities.notes: Killed with another nine members of her family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

fatalities.name: Samaher Khalil Mahmoud Qdeih
fatalities.notes: Killed when she left her house to go with her family to a more secure house.

fatalities.name: Tahrir Ziad Muhammad Salman
fatalities.notes: Killed while sitting in her yard with other family members, one of whom was also killed in the bombing.

fatalities.name: Fayzeh Muhammad Mustafa al-Hassumi
fatalities.notes: Killed together with her father while they tried to extinguish a fire caused by a rocket that landed on their farmland.

fatalities.name: Najah Harb Salem Qdeih
fatalities.notes: Killed with her daughter while standing at the entrance to their house.

fatalities.name: Nidal Ibrahim Hamdan Qdeih
fatalities.notes: Killed with her mother while standing at the entrance to their house.

fatalities.name: Ne'meh Yusef Muhisen a-Nabahin
fatalities.notes: Killed when struck by a shell while standing outside of her house.

fatalities.name: Intesar Farid Suliman al-Masri
fatalities.notes: Killed when she returned to see the condition of her house, which was situated close to the border.

fatalities.name: Ghanimah Ma'sud Nimer Abu Halimah
fatalities.notes: A disabled person, she remained at home when her family transferred to the UNRWA-school compound as she was unable to walk and Red Cross personnel were unable to get to the house to take her.

fatalities.name: Mahdiyeah Suliman Muhammad 'Ayad
fatalities.notes: Shot with her husband by soldiers while they were fleeing from their house in a-Zeitun neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Fatimah 'Awad Khalil Ghaben
fatalities.notes: Killed while on her way home.

fatalities.name: Maryam Mutawe'a Nasrallah Mutawe'aen
fatalities.notes: Her body was found under the ruins of her house, which had been shelled and then demolished by bulldozers.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Mahmoud 'Obeid 'Abdallah
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home in the 'Izbet 'Abd Rabo neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Bisan 'Iz a-Din Muhammad Abu al-'Eish
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home with her family in 'Izbet 'Abd Rabo.

fatalities.name: Zakiyyeh 'Abd al-Hai 'Ali Abu 'Aytah
fatalities.notes: Killed while in front of her house with three members of her family.

fatalities.name: Manal Hassan 'Ali al-Batran
fatalities.notes: Killed when her house was bombed, apparently with the aim of killing her husband.

fatalities.name: Samah 'Atiyyah Muhammad Siyam
fatalities.notes: Sister-in-law of Sa'id Siyam, she was killed with her husband in the bombing of Siyam's house.

fatalities.name: Iman 'Abd al-Qader Jebril Islim
fatalities.notes: Killed in the bombing of the house of Sa'id Siyam.

fatalities.name: Amal 'Ayad 'Odeh Irmeilat
fatalities.notes: Killed with her mother-in-law and her three children when they came to check their house, which had been bombed.

fatalities.name: 'Aishah 'Ayad 'Eid Irmeilat
fatalities.notes: Killed with her daughter-in-law and her three grandchildren when they came to check their house that had been bombed.

fatalities.name: Ihssan Mahmoud Zaki al-Hadad
fatalities.notes: Burned to death with her husband and two children when the car in which they were fleeing from their home in the Tel al-Hawa neighborhood was bombed with phosphorous.

fatalities.name: Layla Rashed Wahdan Abu 'Aqleen
fatalities.notes: Killed at home.

fatalities.name: Rajaa Muhammad Ramadan Ghaben
fatalities.notes: Killed while standing at the entrance to her house.

fatalities.name: Kafa Muhammad 'Abd a-Rahman a-Nazer
fatalities.notes: Killed when she went outside to care for her neighbors Hanan and 'Aishah a-Najar, who were wounded when the yard of their house was shelled.

fatalities.name: Hanan Sha'ban 'Urabi a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed with her infant daughter as she ran towards her children who had been hit by a bombing in the yard of their house.

fatalities.name: Samira 'Afif Hassan Musa
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home with her family in the a-Sabra neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Kafa Muhammad 'Abd a-Rahman a-Neder
fatalities.notes: Killed when she went to help wounded women and children who were near her house.

fatalities.name: Shadyah Ahmad Jaber
fatalities.notes: Killed with her husband in the bombing of their apartment in a residential building.

fatalities.name: Halimah Muhammad Muhammad Siyam
fatalities.notes: Killed when she came out of her house to aid relatives whose house had been bombed. Bulldozers demolished the house, leaving her body underneath the ruins.

fatalities.name: Nazirah Muhammad Khaled Abu al-Kas (al-Hilu)
fatalities.notes: Killed with her husband while they were at home.

fatalities.name: Rasha Ahmad Khalil a-Smeiri
fatalities.notes: Killed while riding a horse-drawn wagon on her way to visit relatives.

fatalities.name: Firyal Kamal Mahmoud al-Bana
fatalities.notes: Killed along with three other persons, among them a doctor who was trying to help the wounded, in a shelling of the apartment building in which she lived.

fatalities.name: Rawheyeh Ahmad Suliman a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed while walking at the head of a group of women carrying a white flag after soldiers had called to residents to leave their houses.

fatalities.name: 'Afaf Rabi' Hassan Jum'ah
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home with her family.

fatalities.name: Jamileh Hassan Ziyadah Ziyadah
fatalities.notes: Killed immediately after exiting her house with members of her family to care for wounded persons.

fatalities.name: Mudallaleh Ahmad Muhammad Abu Rakbah
fatalities.notes: Killed while fleeing with her family from their house after their neighbor's house was bombed.

fatalities.name: Dalal 'Ashur As'ad al-Katati
fatalities.notes: Hit while at home.

fatalities.name: Randah Jamal Faraj 'Abd Rabo
fatalities.notes: Killed when a missile struck the grocery store of the 'Abd Rabo family.

fatalities.name: In'am 'Abed Darwish al-Baba
fatalities.notes: Killed while sitting with her family in the yard of their house.

fatalities.name: Hanan Fathi 'Abd al-Ghani a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed while she fled with her family to her parents' house after her house had been destroyed by the army.

fatalities.name: Randah Faiz Muhammad Salhah
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with her four children and her sister.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Faiz Muhammad al-Hilu
fatalities.notes: Killed while visiting her sister's home.

fatalities.name: Sumayah Jum'ah Sa'id Sa'ed
fatalities.notes: Killed while standing in front of her house with members of her family.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Sa'id Mustafa Sa'ed
fatalities.notes: Killed while standing in front of her house with members of her family.

fatalities.name: Amal Ahmad Yasin al-Madhun
fatalities.notes: Wounded while at home and died later.

fatalities.name: Halimah Isma'il Ibrahim Saleh
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home with her family.

fatalities.name: Maathar Muhammad Salem Zneid
fatalities.notes: Killed while fleeing with her family from their house to the local school.

fatalities.name: Faten 'Abd al-'Aziz Silmi Zneid
fatalities.notes: Killed while fleeing with her family from their house to a school in the area.

fatalities.name: Ruqayah Muhammad Muhammad Abu a-Naja
fatalities.notes: Killed along with her son-in-law, Ihab al-Wahidi, in her home in the Tel al-Hawa neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Nujud Rajab Swelem Ghaben
fatalities.notes: Killed at home.

fatalities.name: Albina Vladimir Yusef al-Jaru
fatalities.notes: Killed with her infant son while they were at home.

fatalities.name: Bader Muhammad Musa Abu Rashed
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home with her family.

fatalities.name: Hakmeh 'Abd a-Rahman Mustafa al-'Attar
fatalities.notes: Killed next to her house.

fatalities.name: Islam Isma'il Suliman 'Abd al-Jawad
fatalities.notes: Killed while she was at home when the house of her neighbor, a Hamas operative, was bombed.

fatalities.name: Fidaa Farid Salamah Abu Sh'ar
fatalities.notes: Killed when she went looking for her husband, Mahmud Abu Sh'ar, who had been shot and killed on his way home.

fatalities.name: Khadijeh 'Abd a-Razeq 'Abd al-Fatah Zamlat
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home with her son. Her grandson was wounded and died later from his wounds.

fatalities.name: Heijar Isma'il Yusef Nseiwi
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home as a result of the bombing of a neighbor's house.

fatalities.name: Kawkab Sa'id Hussein a-Dayah
fatalities.notes: Killed along with 21 relatives when the house in which they were in was bombed. The army admitted that the house had been bombed by mistake, and that the family had not been warned of the army's intention to bomb it.

fatalities.name: Sabrin Faiz Mesbah a-Dayah
fatalities.notes: Killed with 21 members of her family when their house was bombed. Later, the army admitted the house had been bombed by mistake, and that the family was not given warning of the intention to bomb it.

fatalities.name: Raghdah Faiz Mesbah a-Dayah
fatalities.notes: Killed with 21 members of her family when their house was bombed. Later, the army admitted the house had been bombed by mistake, and that the family was not given warning of the intention to bomb it.

fatalities.name: Rawdah Hilal Hussein a-Dayah
fatalities.notes: Killed with 21 members of her family when their house was bombed. Later, the army admitted the house had been bombed by mistake, and that the family was not given warning of the intention to bomb it.

fatalities.name: Tazal Isma'il Muhammad a-Dayah
fatalities.notes: Killed with 21 members of her family when their house was bombed. Later, the army admitted the house had been bombed by mistake, and that the family was not given warning of the intention to bomb it.

fatalities.name: Safaa Saleh Muhammad a-Dayah
fatalities.notes: Killed with 21 members of her family when their house was bombed. Later, the army admitted the house had been bombed by mistake, and that the family was not given warning of the intention to bomb it.

fatalities.name: 'Afaf Muhammad al-'Abed Dmeidah
fatalities.notes: Killed while hanging laundry on the roof of her house.

fatalities.name: Hibah Jamil 'Ali 'Amshah
fatalities.notes: Killed when she tried to return home to get provisions.

fatalities.name: Mahzeyah Shihadah Hassan Saleh
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home with her husband, daughter, and daughter-in-law.

fatalities.name: Samia Fathi 'Abd al-Fatah Saleh
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home with her husband's parents and sister.

fatalities.name: Rihab 'Abd al-Men'em Ramadan 'Awad
fatalities.notes: Killed by mortar fire that hit the street next to UNRWA's al-Fakhura school, in the Jabalya refugee camp, where persons had gone for refuge after they had to leave their houses. Earlier, militants had fired rockets from the area.

fatalities.name: Khadrah 'Abd al-'Aziz 'Abd al-'Aziz 'Awad
fatalities.notes: Killed by mortar fire that hit the street next to UNRWA's al-Fakhura school, in the Jabalya refugee camp, where persons had gone for refuge having been forced to leave their houses. Earlier, militants had fired rockets from the area.

fatalities.name: Amal Matar Saleh Dib
fatalities.notes: Killed with ten members of her family while she was standing in the entrance to her house, near al-Fakhura School. Earlier, armed militants had fired rockets from the area.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Samir Shafiq Dib
fatalities.notes: Killed with ten members of her family while she was standing in the entrance to her house, near al-Fakhura School. Earlier, armed militants had fired rockets from the area.

fatalities.name: Alaa Mu'in Shafiq Dib
fatalities.notes: Killed with ten members of her family while she was standing in the entrance to her house, near al-Fakhura School. Earlier, armed militants had fired rockets from the area.

fatalities.name: Shammah Salem Hussein Dib
fatalities.notes: Killed with ten members of her family in her home, near al-Fakhura School. Earlier, armed militants had fired rockets from the area.

fatalities.name: Nahil Khaled 'Abd a-Rahman Abu 'Eishah
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with her husband and her three children in a-Nasser neighborhood, some 200 meters from the Internal Ministry headquarters and the former Palestinian Intelligence headquarters. B'Tselem's investigation indicates that armed militants apparently were not present in the area.

fatalities.name: Nai Faiz Yusef Hassan
fatalities.notes: Killed at home together with her father.

fatalities.name: Wafa Nabil 'Ali Abu Jarad
fatalities.notes: Killed by flechette-shell darts while in a condolence tent. Five other persons were killed in the incident.

fatalities.name: 'Ula Ma'sud Khalil 'Arafat
fatalities.notes: Killed by soldiers' firing in a-Zaitun neighborhood along with Shahd Haji and Muhammad Samir Haji, as they tried to get to a safe place together with other civilians.

fatalities.name: Salimeh Mesleh Subhi Salam
fatalities.notes: Killed at home.

fatalities.name: Khadrah al-'Abed Khalil al-Maleh
fatalities.notes: Killed at home in a-Shaja'iyah neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Lubna Fouad Tawfiq al-Maleh
fatalities.notes: Killed at home in a-Shaja'iyah neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Amal Zaki 'Aref 'Aleiwa
fatalities.notes: Killed with four of her children when a shell penetrated their fourth-floor apartment in a-Shaja'iyah neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Kamleh 'Ali Mustafa al-'Attar
fatalities.notes: Refused to join her son and grandchildren when they fled from the house on 5 January '09. Her body was found in the house when her family returned, on 20 January.

fatalities.name: Fadwa Khalil Muhammad Kahil
fatalities.notes: Killed with two members of her family when their house in a-Zeitun neighborhood was bombed.

fatalities.name: Muti'ah 'Abd a-Rahman Ibrahim a-Samuni
fatalities.notes: Killed at the entrance to her house.

fatalities.name: Layla Nabih Mahmoud a-Samuni
fatalities.notes: Killed in a-Zeitun neighborhood when soldiers ordered the extended Samuni family to gather in the house of one of the family members. The next morning, the house was bombed and collapsed on its occupants, killing 21 of the family, and injuring many. For two days, soldiers prohibited the Red Cross from removing the injured.

fatalities.name: Rahmeh Muhammad Mahmoud a-Samuni
fatalities.notes: Killed in a-Zeitun neighborhood when soldiers ordered the extended Samuni family to gather in the house of one of the family members. The next morning, the house was bombed and collapsed on its occupants, killing 21 of the family, and injuring many. For two days, soldiers prohibited the Red Cross from removing the injured.

fatalities.name: Razaqeh Muhammad Mahmoud a-Samuni
fatalities.notes: Killed in a-Zeitun neighborhood when soldiers ordered the extended Samuni family to gather in the house of one of the family members. The next morning, the house was bombed and collapsed on its occupants, killing 21 of the family, and injuring many. For two days, soldiers prohibited the Red Cross from removing the injured.

fatalities.name: Rabab 'Izzat 'Ali a-Samuni
fatalities.notes: Killed in a-Zeitun neighborhood when soldiers ordered the extended Samuni family to gather in the house of one of the family members. The next morning, the house was bombed and collapsed on its occupants, killing 21 of the family, and injuring many. For two days, soldiers prohibited the Red Cross from removing the injured.

fatalities.name: Maha Muhammad Ibrahim a-Samuni
fatalities.notes: Killed in a-Zeitun neighborhood when soldiers ordered the extended Samuni family to gather in the house of one of the family members. The next morning, the house was bombed and collapsed on its occupants, killing 21 of the family, and injuring many. For two days, soldiers prohibited the Red Cross from removing the injured.

fatalities.name: Safaa Subhi Muhammad a-Samuni
fatalities.notes: Killed in a-Zeitun neighborhood when soldiers ordered the extended Samuni family to gather in the house of one of the family members. The next morning, the house was bombed and collapsed on its occupants, killing 21 of the family, and injuring many. For two days, soldiers prohibited the Red Cross from removing the injured.

fatalities.name: Hanan Khamis Sa'di a-Samuni
fatalities.notes: Killed in a-Zeitun neighborhood when soldiers ordered the extended Samuni family to gather in the house of one of the family members. The next morning, the house was bombed and collapsed on its occupants, killing 21 of the family, and injuring many. For two days, soldiers prohibited the Red Cross from removing the injured.

fatalities.name: Ibtesam Ahmad Muhammad al-Qanu'
fatalities.notes: Soldiers demolished her house with a bulldozer and shot and killed her when she exited the house with her mother-in-law, waving a white flag.

fatalities.name: Rida Khalil Hassan 'Ali
fatalities.notes: Killed while riding in a taxi with members of her family.

fatalities.name: Safeyeh Salem Hussein Haydar
fatalities.notes: Killed while next to her house.

fatalities.name: Jamileh 'Abd al-'Aziz Salem a-Da'ur
fatalities.notes: Her body and the body of her son were found bullet-ridden in their home.

fatalities.name: Ghadah Riyad Rajab Abu Halimah
fatalities.notes: Was severely burned when a white phosphorous shell struck her house, and died later from her wounds. Four others from her family were burned to death in the incident and her father-in-law was killed when struck directly by the shell. Four other family members, including her infant daughter, suffered burns.

fatalities.name: Majedah 'Abd al-Karim Abu Hajaj
fatalities.notes: Killed with her mother by a soldier who fired from a tank as she walked with a group of persons carrying a white flag. Their bodies were left in the street until the army withdrew because ambulances were not allowed to reach the site. Previously , the family had to leave their house, which was shelled.

fatalities.name: Rayah Salamah Salman Abu Hajaj
fatalities.notes: Killed with her daughter by a soldier who fired from a tank as she walked with a group of persons carrying a white flag. Their bodies were left in the street until the army withdrew because ambulances were not allowed to reach the site. Previously , the family had to leave their house, which was shelled.

fatalities.name: Iman Nimer Suliman al-'Arur
fatalities.notes: Killed at home with four members of her family.

fatalities.name: 'Awatef Salman Salamah Abu Khusah
fatalities.notes: Killed while trying to salvage the body of Iyad Khusah.

fatalities.name: Tahani Kamal Abu 'Aish
fatalities.notes: Killed when struck in the head with shrapnel. She was at home, about 700 meters from the Israeli border. The firing was apparently aimed at an adjacent site from which rockets had been fired.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Salah Isma'il Salah
fatalities.notes: Killed while she was at home with her family.

fatalities.name: Nawal Isma'il Rayan
fatalities.notes: Wife of Nizar Rayan, a senior Hamas official. She was killed along with 15 members of her family when the family's house was bombed. The army contends that the house was used to store ammunition and a tunnel had been built under it. According to officials, the army warned the family but they refused to leave the house.

fatalities.name: Hiyam 'Abd a-Rahman Rayan
fatalities.notes: Wife of Nizar Rayan, a senior Hamas official. She was killed along with 15 members of her family when the family's house was bombed. The army contends that the house was used to store ammunition and a tunnel had been built under it. According to officials, the army warned the family but they refused to leave the house.

fatalities.name: Iman Khalil Rayan
fatalities.notes: Wife of Nizar Rayan, a senior Hamas official. She was killed along with 15 members of her family when the family's house was bombed. The army contends that the house was used to store ammunition and a tunnel had been built under it. The army warned the family, but they refused to leave.

fatalities.name: Shirin Sa'id Rayan
fatalities.notes: Wife of Nizar Rayan, a senior Hamas official. She was killed along with 15 members of her family when the family's house was bombed. The army contends that the house was used to store ammunition and a tunnel had been built under it. The army warned the family, but they refused to leave.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Abu Jabah Faraj 'Alush
fatalities.notes: Killed at home.

fatalities.name: Iman Hassan Mahmoud Abu 'Aridah
fatalities.notes: Killed at her home from a missile the army fired on an adjacent park.

fatalities.name: Maysaa Munir Yihya Kashku
fatalities.notes: Killed while at her home in a-Zeitun neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Rawyah Rajab Ahmad 'Awad
fatalities.notes: Killed while waiting for a taxi next to the police station that was bombed in a-Shaja'iyah neighborhood.

fatalities.name: Nazek Hassan Yasin Abu Rayya
fatalities.notes: Killed in Security and Defense Department headquarters.

fatalities.name: Ne'meh 'Ali Ahmad al-Maghari
fatalities.notes: Student at the UNRWA professional training center. She was killed with 12 other persons next to the center while waiting for a ride.

fatalities.name: Wafa Marwan 'Ali a-Dasuqi
fatalities.notes: Student at the UNRWA professional training center. She was killed with 12 other persons next to the center while waiting for a ride.

fatalities.name: Huda Hani Hussni Zuhd
fatalities.notes: Killed at police station near the Legislative Council building.

fatalities.name: Fadiyah Jaber Jaber Abu Hweige
fatalities.notes: Killed with her father and two brothers in their home next to a police station and a Hamas training base that were bombed.

fatalities.name: Sarah 'Eid 'Ali al-Hawajri
fatalities.notes: Killed in the bombing of the National Security building as she passed on her way to buy provisions at the market.

fatalities.name: Myasarah Muhammad Muhammad 'Udwan
fatalities.notes: Killed while on her way to buy provisions.

fatalities.name: Yusra Ibrahim Msallam Qdeih
fatalities.notes: Killed when standing in the doorway of her house during an army action in the Khaza'a area.

fatalities.name: Wafa Shaker Muhammad a-Daghameh
fatalities.notes: Killed when soldiers blew down the door of her house just as she was about to open it.

fatalities.name: Meyasar Mutlaq Rashid Abu Me'teq
fatalities.notes: Killed with her four children while eating breakfast in the yard of their house.

fatalities.name: Ghadah al-'Abed Ahmad Saleh
fatalities.notes: Killed in the kitchen of her house.

fatalities.name: Samah Zidan Muhammad Ghali 'Asaliyah
fatalities.notes: Killed when she was at home during the incursion into the area.

fatalities.name: Rajaa 'Abd a-Rahman Muhammad 'Atallah
fatalities.notes: Killed when at home with her family during the incursion into the Jabalya refugee camp.

fatalities.name: Ibtesam 'Abd a-Rahman Muhammad 'Atallah
fatalities.notes: Killed when at home with her family during the incursion into the Jabalya refugee camp.

fatalities.name: Su'ad Rajab Yusef 'Atallah
fatalities.notes: Killed when at home with her family during the incursion into the Jabalya refugee camp.

fatalities.name: Nuhad 'Abd al-Hadi Muhammad Daher
fatalities.notes: Killed by a missile that landed five meters from her as she tried to run from her home after a shell struck nearby.

fatalities.name: Haniyeh Hussein Muhammad 'Abd al-Jawad
fatalities.notes: Killed at her nephew's wedding, when a missile was fired at the nearby Ministry of Interior building, which was abandoned.

fatalities.name: Maryam Ahmad Muhammad a-Rahel
fatalities.notes: Wanted. Killed in an exchange of gunfire with soldiers who had surrounded his house.

fatalities.name: Fathiya Yusef 'Omar al-Hassumi
fatalities.notes: Killed when riding in a car on the way home from the market.

fatalities.name: Khadrah Ahmad 'Ali Wahdan
fatalities.notes: Killed by return fire at Qassam rockets that were being fired at Israeli territory from the same area where he was located.

fatalities.name: Maysaa Nimer Muhammad Fanunah
fatalities.notes: Killed when she shot at the soldiers at a checkpoint, together with another armed person.

fatalities.name: Iman Muhammad Ibrahim Hamdan
fatalities.notes: Killed during the incursion when she and others in her family left the house after shots had been fired at it.

fatalities.name: Asmaa Hamdan 'Abd a-Rahim Fayad
fatalities.notes: Killed when she moved about with armed men during the army's incursion into the area.

fatalities.name: Karimah 'Abd a-Rahman Ahmad Fayad
fatalities.notes: Killed when she moved about with armed men during the army's incursion into the area.

fatalities.name: Khaldeyeh Ahmad Hamdan a-Talbani
fatalities.notes: Killed when soldiers opened fire at pilgrims from Mecca waiting at the checkpoint.

fatalities.name: Sabha Suliman Salman al-Qara
fatalities.notes: Killed when, during an army operation, she heard her son had been wounded and went outside to see how he was.

fatalities.name: Amal Shaker Zidan Dolah
fatalities.notes: Killed while walking near her home. Armed Palestinians were present in the area.

fatalities.name: Khairieh Ahmad Muhammad Nazzal
fatalities.notes: Killed when she went to help an injured person next to her house.

fatalities.name: Ibtesam Hassan Muhammad Abu Marseh
fatalities.notes: Killed while standing next to the window of her house fifteen minutes after armed men launched a Qassam rocket from the area and fled.

fatalities.name: Sa'diyah Hassan 'Atallah Hirzallah
fatalities.notes: Killed in her house during a operation to arrest Ayman Hasanein.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Ahmad Saleh al-'Athamneh

fatalities.notes: Killed while inside her home when Israeli artillery shells struck a residential neighborhood in Beit Hanun, killing 19 civilians, including 7 minors, and wounding some 40 others.

fatalities.notes: Killed while inside her home when Israeli artillery shells struck a residential neighborhood in Beit Hanun, killing 19 civilians, including 7 minors, and wounding some 40 others.

fatalities.notes: Killed while inside her home when Israeli artillery shells struck a residential neighborhood in Beit Hanun, killing 19 civilians, including 7 minors, and wounding some 40 others.

fatalities.name: Najwa 'Awad Rajab Khalif

fatalities.name: Ibtesam Yusef Ahmad Ma'sud

fatalities.name: Rawdah Ibrahim Salem Jaber
fatalities.notes: Killed while participating in a demonstration against the incursion into Beit Hanun.

fatalities.name: Fatimah 'Abd al-Fatah Ahmad Zahran
fatalities.notes: Killed while sitting inside her home during an operation to arrest wanted persons.

fatalities.name: Ne'meh Hassan Hassan 'Udwan
fatalities.notes: Killed during an IDF operation.

fatalities.name: Zaher Ahmad Jum'ah Qdeih
fatalities.notes: Killed while standing at the entrance of her house during incursion into the area.

fatalities.name: I'atimad Isma'il Suliman Abu Mu'ammar

fatalities.name: Maryam Muhammad Ibrahim Farhudah
fatalities.notes: Killed while sitting with her husband next to their house, when she was struck by shrapnel from a missile fired at a passing car.

fatalities.name: Huda 'Issa 'Abd Rabo a-Natur

fatalities.name: Mirvat Faiz 'Abdallah al-Mamluk (Abu Sharkh)
