fatalities.name: Kamleh Ahmad Rashid a-Najar
fatalities.notes: Killed while sitting next to her home.

fatalities.name: Asmaa 'Ali 'Abd a-Rasul 'Okal
fatalities.notes: Killed while sitting in her yard with her children. Two of her daughters were killed and two were injured.

fatalities.name: Khairieh Hashem Muhammad al-'Attar
fatalities.notes: Killed along with her 11 year-old grandson by missile fired by Israeli air force, while traveling in a horse-drawn cart after collecting Qassam rocket launchers.

fatalities.name: Sabah Muhammad Mustafa Hararah
fatalities.notes: Killed while on the roof during an IDF incursion into the refugee camp.

fatalities.name: Hanan Ibrahim Ahmad al-'Aruqi
fatalities.notes: Killed when the Israeli airforce fired missiles into the refugee camp.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Fadel Bashir Jadallah
fatalities.notes: Killed during "Operation Summer Rains" while was in her house about 700 m away from the border.

fatalities.name: Salwa Isma'il Rashid Abu Selmiyeh
fatalities.notes: Nine members of the Abu Selmiyeh family, parents and 7 of their children, all minors, were killed by missile-fire aimed at their house. According to the IDF, senior Hamas-members were hiding in the house

fatalities.name: Amneh Yusef al-'Abed Hajjaj
fatalities.notes: Killed with her son and daughter during "Operation Summer Rains" when they were in their house.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Ahmad Muhammad Ahmad
fatalities.notes: Killed at home by missile fire aimed at wanted persons riding in a vehicle on the street nearby.

fatalities.name: 'Aishah Fares Saleh Abu Msalam
fatalities.notes: Killed while standing near a window of her house. There was no exchange of gunfire at the time.

fatalities.name: Hanan Muhammad Hussein Aman
fatalities.notes: Killed while riding in the family car with her daughter and grandson. Other family members were injured.

fatalities.name: Na'imah Mahmoud Hamdi Aman
fatalities.notes: Killed while riding in the family car with her mother and son. Other family members were injured.

fatalities.name: 'Itaf Ahmad Mahmoud Zalat

fatalities.name: Nayfeh Muhammad Khamis Abu Masa'ed

fatalities.name: Nawal Ahmad As'ad Dweikat

fatalities.name: Haifaa Dawood Muhammad Hindeyah

fatalities.name: Fidda 'Atiyyah Hassan 'Aram

fatalities.name: Intesar Ahmad Jaber Darwish

fatalities.name: Fatimah Muhammad Hussein
fatalities.notes: Killed while at home eating supper during the Operation Days of Repentance.

fatalities.name: Najah Zaki Wadi' a-Shawa
fatalities.notes: Killed by a bullet that hit her in the back while she was at home.

fatalities.name: Ibriz Durgham Dib al-Minawi
fatalities.notes: Killed while on the roof of her house by IDF gunfire during an incursion into Nablus.

fatalities.name: Ne'meh Ibrahim Salman Abu Sahlul

fatalities.name: Ghalyah Hammad Muhammad Yunes
fatalities.notes: Killed near the tent in which she lived.

fatalities.name: Jamileh 'Abd al-Hadi 'Abd Rabo Hamad
fatalities.notes: Killed during an IDF incursion into Beit Hanun.

fatalities.name: Thana 'Abd al-Hadi Hammad Qdeih

fatalities.name: Dalal Majahad Shihadah Abu al-Hassan

fatalities.name: Muna Faiz Ahmad Isma'il
fatalities.notes: Killed when she was shot in the head while at home during an IDF incursion into Rafah.

fatalities.name: Kamleh Muhammad As'ad a-Shuli

fatalities.name: Imtiaz Abu Ras

fatalities.name: Widad Kamel 'Abd a-Rahman al-'A'jrami

fatalities.name: Sabarah Salem Ibrahim Hamdiya

fatalities.name: Nivin Ahmad 'Abd al-Malek Abu Rjeileh

fatalities.name: Su'ad 'Abd al-'Aziz Shteiwi al-Bahadri

fatalities.name: Islam Sa'id Isma'il 'Abdallah

fatalities.name: Samia Mahmoud Muhammad Dalul
fatalities.notes: Killed during the assassination of Masud Titi while she was in the car with her sister.

fatalities.name: Majedah Mahmoud Muhammad Dalul
fatalities.notes: Killed during the assassination of Masud Titi while she was in the car with her sister.

fatalities.name: Khadrah Yusef Muhammad Abu Hamadah

fatalities.name: Maryam Rajab Ibrahim 'Abd Rabo

fatalities.name: Rasmiya Hamdallah Sharif 'Arrar
fatalities.notes: Killed during an IDF incursion into the village

fatalities.name: Ikram Barhum Salman Qdeih

fatalities.name: Subhiya Muslem Wadah Abu 'Atawi

fatalities.name: Fathiya Mahmoud Hussein 'Alawneh

fatalities.name: 'Aziza Dib al-Qaysar

fatalities.name: Nuha Sabri 'Abd al-Hamid al-Maqadmeh

fatalities.name: Camilla Abu Sa'id

fatalities.name: Su'ad Jadallah

fatalities.name: Sadiqa Abu Shalub

fatalities.name: Ahlam Rizeq Qandil

fatalities.name: Fatimah 'Obeid

fatalities.name: Samar Shar'ab
fatalities.notes: Killed in her house.

fatalities.name: Fatimah Ahmad Abu Jazar

fatalities.name: Samira Muhammad Abu Jazar

fatalities.name: Yusra Shawalheh

fatalities.name: Shaden Abu Hajleh

fatalities.name: Fathiya 'Abdallah Jum'ah a-Sufi

fatalities.name: Rahima Hassan 'Ali Salamah
fatalities.notes: Killed during an IDF incursion into the city.

fatalities.name: Samira Dahadar
fatalities.notes: Killed in her home during an IDF incursion into the city.

fatalities.name: Rowayda Abu al-Hajin
fatalities.notes: Killed while sleeping in the vineyard where she worked. In the incident, the army fired flechettes and other kinds of ammunition. Which ammunition killed her is unclear

fatalities.name: Fatimah 'Abdallah 'Awwad Abu Daher

fatalities.name: Iman Hassan Matar
fatalities.notes: Killed while she was sleeping when the a one-ton bomb was dropped on the building in which she was in.

fatalities.name: Layla Khamis Shihadah
fatalities.notes: Killed while she was sleeping when the a one-ton bomb was dropped on the building in which she was in.

fatalities.name: Muna Fahmi al-Huti
fatalities.notes: Killed while she was sleeping when the a one-ton bomb was dropped on the building in which she was in.

fatalities.name: Randah Khaled Isma'il al-Hindi

fatalities.name: Sahar Mahmoud al-Hindi

fatalities.name: Kamleh Abu Sa'id

fatalities.name: Fatimah Ibrahim Zakarneh

fatalities.name: Sabha Ghanem

fatalities.name: Rana Sa'di al-Qarjeh

fatalities.name: Jamileh Hardan
fatalities.notes: Killed while she was in her goat pen.

fatalities.name: Amal Hardan
fatalities.notes: Killed while she was in her goat pen.

fatalities.name: Manal Sufian
fatalities.notes: Killed in her house.

fatalities.name: Zeha Faiz Freitakh
fatalities.notes: Killed during "Operation Defensive Shield."

fatalities.name: Rasha Faiz Freitakh
fatalities.notes: Killed during "Operation Defensive Shield."

fatalities.name: Nabilah 'Abd a-Ra'uf Ahmad Ghanem

fatalities.name: Fadwa Fathi 'Abdallah Jamal
fatalities.notes: Killed during "Operation Defensive Shield."

fatalities.name: Sadiqa 'Oqasheh

fatalities.name: Sumayah Musa Na'im 'Abdah

fatalities.name: Widad Hamid

fatalities.name: Maryam 'Abdallah Mahmoud Washahi
fatalities.notes: Killed during "Operation Defensive Shield."

fatalities.notes: Killed during "Operation Defensive Shield."

fatalities.name: Huda Isma'il al-Khawajah

fatalities.name: Mufideh Muhammad Abu Daqah

fatalities.name: Bushara Abu Kweik

fatalities.name: Su'ad a-Sheikh Khalil

fatalities.name: 'Aiyadah Dawood Fathiya

fatalities.name: Fatimah Jamal Jalal Abu Jeish

fatalities.name: Arij Saber Sa'id al-Jabali

fatalities.name: 'Aziza Muhammad Danun

fatalities.name: Rahmeh Rashid Shahin
fatalities.notes: Killed during the assassination of Hussein Abayat.
